channel.title: Testing on Today I learned
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Today I learned

item.title: PHPUnit
item.description: Source The tests for a class Class go into a class ClassTest. ClassTest inherits (most of the time) from PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase. The tests are public methods that are named test*. Inside the test methods, assertion methods such as assertSame() (see Assertions) are used to assert that an actual value matches an expected value.
